incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures to a Subset of Twilio Colombia Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are observing a subset of call failures to Twilio Colombia phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to MTN Network in Uganda

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN network in Uganda. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - MegaFon and Yota

incident_updates.body:
The MegaFon and Yota networks in Russia are conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 22 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon and Yota Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 21 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
22 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 22 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 August 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 22 August 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets.

The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, August 24th, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 August 2024 at 23:00 PDT until 27 August 2024 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and country: Rogers Canada, Telus Canada, Bell Canada.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]
